Advantages.title: What sets us apart from other studios?
Advantages.subtitle: We don't just write code — we create tools for your business growth. No overpayments, delays or stress.
Advantages.ctaAriaLabel: Open form to discuss the project

advantage1.title: No empty promises — only real deadlines
advantage1.description: We know how tiring 'ready tomorrow' from other contractors is. We set clear deadlines before the start and stick to them. Average landing page development time is 7-10 days, complex project — up to 4 weeks.

advantage2.title: Your website will find customers, not gather dust in Google
advantage2.description: Many web studios make 'pretty pictures' but forget the main thing — attracting customers. We embed SEO optimization and analytics at the development stage so your website works for results right away.

advantage3.title: Transparency at every step
advantage3.description: No surprises with cost or functionality. You see the development process in real time, receive reports and can make changes at any stage. Telegram/WhatsApp always in touch.

advantage4.title: Website that works on all devices
advantage4.description: In 2025, 70% of users come from phones. We create responsive websites that look perfect on smartphones, tablets and computers. Fast loading + convenient navigation = more sales.

advantage5.title: Technologies that won't become outdated in a year
advantage5.description: We use a modern technology stack (React, Next.js, Node.js) that is easy to scale and maintain. Your website will be relevant for years, not require a complete overhaul tomorrow.

advantage6.title: Post-launch support — free for a month
advantage6.description: The first month after launch, technical support, minor bug fixes and consultations are free. We don't disappear after payment.

seo.title: About Us — ABECT | Ukrainian Web Studio
seo.description: ABECT is a Ukrainian web studio that creates quality web solutions for business. Learn about our team, work approach, and values.
seo.keywords: about us, web studio, development team, ABECT, about company

hero.title: We create digital products that work
hero.subtitle: ABECT is a Ukrainian web studio that transforms ideas into functional websites and applications for business

story.title: Who We Are
story.paragraph1: ABECT started as an idea to create quality web solutions for the Ukrainian and European markets. Over time, we've grown from simple landing pages to complex fintech platforms and banking integrations. Today, we are a team of professionals who combine technical expertise, creative design, and effective marketing.
story.paragraph2: We believe in a practical approach: no excessive theory, only working solutions that deliver results. Our team combines development, design, and marketing under one roof, allowing us to quickly implement projects of any complexity. We don't just execute technical tasks — we delve into the client's business, understand their goals, and offer solutions that actually work.
story.paragraph3: Every project for us is an opportunity to create something valuable. We work with businesses of all sizes: from startups just launching to established companies needing modernization or scaling. Our goal is not just to make a website, but to create a tool that will help your business grow and thrive in the digital environment.

team.title: Team
team.subtitle: Professionals who make your ideas a reality

member1.name: Roman Popovych
member1.description: Specializing in Node.js, React, and fintech integrations. I love complex technical challenges and build systems that scale.

member2.name: Dayana Melai
member2.description: I create interfaces that not only look good but are also user-friendly. I work to make every project intuitive and visually appealing. I believe design should solve problems, not create them.

member3.name: Nadiia Lopushanska
member3.description: I help brands find their audience on social media. I develop content strategies, automate publications, and analyze campaign effectiveness. I make your social media work for your business.

member4.name: Ivan Lopushanskyi
member4.description: I ensure all projects are delivered on time and meet client expectations. I coordinate the team, maintain communication with clients, and make the development process transparent and predictable.

principle1.title: Direct client dialogue
principle1.description: No intermediaries or unnecessary bureaucracy. You communicate directly with those who are working on your project.

principle2.title: Practical solutions
principle2.description: We choose technologies and approaches that actually work, not just trendy ones. We focus on results.

principle3.title: Code and design quality
principle3.description: We make sure the product is easy to maintain and scales well. Your site won't break in a month.

principle4.title: Process transparency
principle4.description: You always know what stage the project is at, how much it will cost, and when it will be ready. No surprises.

clients.title: Who We Work With
clients.description:
We are suitable for businesses that value:

→ Technical expertise in complex projects
→ Development speed without quality loss
→ Individual approach and flexibility
→ Long-term product support
→ Honest answers instead of promises

If you need not just a contractor, but a team that will understand your business and offer the best solution — we're your choice.

cta.title: Ready to start a project?
cta.text: Write to us about your idea — we'll discuss the details and offer the best solution. We respond within a day.
